meanings.definition: Skillful in underhanded or evil schemes; cunning
meanings.sent1: The craftiest fox in the forest always outsmarts the other animals.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the craftiest thief in town, able to steal without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent3: The craftiest magician at the party amazed everyone with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: His craftiest move was convincing everyone he was innocent while plotting his revenge.
meanings.sent5: The craftiest spy in the agency could gather information without anyone suspecting a thing.

meanings.definition: Showing cleverness or skill in achieving one's aims
meanings.sent1: The craftiest student in the class always found a way to solve the most difficult problems.
meanings.sent2: He was the craftiest negotiator in the business, always getting the best deals.
meanings.sent3: The craftiest chef in the kitchen could turn simple ingredients into gourmet dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her craftiest idea was to start a small business that quickly grew into a successful company.
meanings.sent5: The craftiest inventor in the workshop created devices that revolutionized the industry.
